CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV , MOT and CHI enter room . MOT is holding CHI's hand as they enter followed by INV
CHI looks at the toys in the room
INV explains the warm-up task to MOT
MOT walks towards the chair near the door
MOT points to the chair at the table
CHI turns and looks at the chair
MOT puts her pocketbook down on the desk
CHI runs over to the chair in the center of the room
MOT pulls the chair out from the table for CHI to get on
CHI puts her hand on the chair and lifts her leg up to sit down
MOT lifts CHI onto the chair
MOT pushes the chair into the table
MOT picks up the books from the floor behind CHI
<bef> CHI looks down at the seat belt
CHI reaches for the seatbelt straps
<bef> MOT puts the book and the jack+in+the+box on the table in front of CHI
MOT leans over and fastens the two straps together across CHI's lap
MOT is visible from waist down only
<bef> MOT stands up and walks backwards behind child
CHI looks down at the seatbelt and touches the strap
MOT bends over chair behind child and runs finger along chair pad
CHI tries to turn the jack+in+the+box
MOT stands up and comes around to the right-hand side of CHI
CHI looks at the wall and opens her mouth wide
CHI still tries to turn the jack+in+the+box
MOT puts her hand on the jack+in+the+box
CHI looks to see what MOT is doing
<bef> MOT turns the jack+in+the+box around to face CHI . MOT stands back
<bef> CHI tries unsuccessfully to turn the crank
MOT leans over and holds the jack+in+the+box with one hand as she turns the crank
CHI lets go of the crank
singing with the music from the jack+in+the+box
stops turning crank and holds jack+in+the+box in front of CHI
CHI turns the crank forwards and then backwards while she holds the jack+in+the+box with her other hand
MOT puts CHI's hand on the crankshaft and helps her turn it
MOT helps CHI turn the handle
CHI puts her fingers in the eyes of the clown
CHI looks down at the table
CHI pushes the clown back into the box
CHI closes the lid of the box
< .1-1> MOT touches the lid of the jack+in+the+box
MOT raises her hands into the air
<aft> MOT turns the handle of the jack+in+the+box
CHI pushes the clown back in the box
MOT helps CHI press the lid of the jack+in+the+box briefly
CHI pushes on the lid until it snaps shut
CHI looks down at the seatbelt
CHI tries to undo the seatbelt
<bef> MOT picks up the book on the table . MOT starts to open the book . <aft> MOT puts the book on the table and walks to the desk
<bef> CHI looked up at MOT . CHI looks down at the seatbelt
CHI tries to re#buckle the seatbelt
CHI looks up at MOT . CHI watches MOT
<bef> MOT picks up a toy car from the floor behind CHI
<bef> MOT puts it on the table in front of CHI
<bef> starts playing with car by rolling it across table
MOT sits down on the chair by the door
CHI rolls the car on the table
CHI picks up the car and looks underneath it
MOT is still out of camera view
CHI puts the car down and rolls it along the table
CHI touches the rumble seat of the car
CHI turns suddenly from MOT and looks at the opposite wall
CHI still moves the car back and forth with her hand
CHI looks at the wall behind MOT and points to something on the wall
MOT turns to face what CHI is looking at on the wall
CHI looks at a picture on the wall
CHI continues to play with the car
CHI turns and looks at the car
CHI rolls the car on the table
<bef> CHI picks the car up and holds it over the table
CHI looks at MOT and then down at the chair
MOT gets up from the chair and comes over to CHI
CHI drops the car onto the chair
MOT pulls the chair out for CHI and then sits down
<bef> CHI picks up the car and puts it on the table . CHI tries to get out of the chair
CHI turns around on chair and looks down at the floor
CHI looks around on the floor
<bef> CHI looks directly below the chair and points
CHI turns back around in the chair to face the table
CHI picks up the car and drops the car on the floor behind the chair
CHI hangs her legs over the side of the chair then tries to get out on the other side of the chair
CHI gets off of the chair and stands up
CHI wobbles as she gets her balance
CHI walks away from the table
CHI looks and points at her belly button
CHI pulls her shirt down and walks towards the football on the floor and kicks it across to the far back corner of the room .
CHI kicks her foot in the air as she walks over to the ball
CHI kicks her leg out as she looks at MOT and smiles
CHI bends over ball and picks it up
CHI crouches with the ball and then throws it ball two- handed towards MOT
MOT bends over in the chair and picks up the ball which has landed in front of her on the floor
CHI walks over to the trash can swinging her arms in the air and touches it
<aft> MOT throws the ball to the far back corner of the room
CHI turns towards ball and looks at it
CHI kicks the ball and pushes it toward a stool in far back corner of room
CHI kicks but keeps missing the ball
CHI stands on ball as she kicks it then loses her balance and falls down
CHI walks over bends down and picks up the toy car which is under the chair in the middle of the room
<aft> CHI stands up with the car in her hands
CHI holds the car upside down and examines it closely
<aft> CHI walks across the room to the table
CHI steps on plastic duck on the way to the table making it squeak
CHI pushes the car forwards and backwards across the seat of the chair
CHI looks up at the duck briefly
CHI continues to run the car on the chair seat
CHI puts the car to her cheek and rubs it up and down
CHI puts the car up to her lips
CHI puts the truck in her mouth
CHI puts the car on the seat of the chair
CHI rolls the car back and forth on the seat of the chair
CHI rests the car on top of the chair back
CHI lets the car drop to floor
CHI bends down to retrieve the car
CHI reaches under the chair to get the car
CHI reaches under the chair to get the car
CHI reaches under the chair to get the car
<aft> CHI gets the car and walks over to duck . CHI drops the car
CHI looks down at the duck briefly
<bef> CHI steps over the toy duck and walks over until she is front of the stool in the corner
CHI looks up at MOT smiling
CHI smiles as she looks at MOT
CHI reaches for electric cord on the wall behind her
CHI lets go of the cord
MOT is sitting below a picture of a frog
CHI gets up off chair and walks towards MOT . CHI walks around aimlessly
CHI smiles and nods slightly once
MOT is still out of camera view
CHI looks at the back wall and points
<bef> CHI looks at MOT briefly . CHI looks at the wall as she continues to point to it . <aft> CHI looks at MOT quickly and then back up at the wall
CHI stops pointing and looks at MOT
CHI takes a few steps towards MOT
CHI looks back up at the wall
CHI takes a few steps towards MOT
MOT is now in camera view
CHI walks over to the chair at the table and starts to climb into it
CHI sits up in the chair
CHI reaches down for the seatbelt
MOT goes over to the chair
MOT puts the seatbelt on CHI
CHI looks down at the seatbelt
MOT begins to open a book on the table
CHI glances up at the book and then looks down at the seatbelt
MOT leans over CHI again holds up the buckle
MOT takes CHI's hands and puts them on the buckle
MOT makes CHI press on buckle fastener
CHI pulls her hands away from MOT
MOT walks backwards and sits in the chair near the door
CHI gets up out of the chair
MOT grabs the toy car on the floor
CHI turns and looks at MOT
rolls car across floor to CHI's chair
CHI looks to see where car went
CHI takes a few steps towards MOT and then goes back and puts her hands on the handles of the chair
INV leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place and re-enters at 09:11:12 .
INV explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT . CHI sits on MOT's lap at the table as she is quite reluctant to participate . INV gives CHI the string of beads to hold onto
INV reaches in the bottom desk drawer and takes out the object
MOT holds CHI firmly on her lap
MOT is encouraging CHI to stay on her lap
<bef> CHI tries to get off MOT's lap
INV puts the object on the table and sets it in motion
MOT dangles the string of beads in front of CHI's reaching hand
CHI continues looking at the object
MOT dangles the string of beads in front of CHI's reaching hand
CHI grasps beads with reaching hand
MOT pulls on the beads so that she draws CHI's hand away from forbidden object
CHI lets go of the beads
MOT points to the wall with the frog picture on it
MOT is asking INV if she can distract CHI by pointing to the pictures on the wall
MOT points to the wall with the frog picture on it
grabs one of the balls on the forbidden object
MOT points to the wall and looks at CHI
CHI lets go of the ball in left hand
CHI looks at INV and points to the frog with her right hand
MOT tries restraining CHI by putting both hands around CHI's waist
CHI reaches for forbidden object and leans towards it
CHI grabs one of the balls on the object
<$=2> MOT points to the wall behind with the tiger picture on it
CHI looks behind her and points to the tiger then turns back to the forbidden object
CHI grabs one of the balls on the object
INV holds the forbidden object on its side on the table in front of CHI
CHI grabs at the balls on the end of the object
playing with the balls with one hand
CHI looks up at the INV and then down at the table
CHI plays with the object and stops
CHI looks up at the object and then to the drawer
INV takes the forbidden object off table and puts it back in the drawer

INV tells MOT about Parent Child Interaction Boxes . INV picks up the toys from Small Scale Activity . MOT and CHI are sitting at table then CHI gets down off MOT's lap and starts to cry . CHI walks towards door and MOT follows . MOT gets the first box .
MOT sits in the chair near the door with the ball box on her lap
CHI takes the ball out of the box
<aft> MOT puts the box on the desk
<aft> MOT moves the chairs out of the way of the path between MOT and CHI
MOT holds out both hands towards CHI
CHI opens her mouth wide in a happy expression
<aft> CHI looks down at floor smiling and opens her arms wide
CHI opens her mouth wide in anticipation
MOT throws the ball onto CHI's hands
CHI lets the ball roll off her hands
MOT retrieves the ball from the floor
throws ball into CHI's outstretched arms
CHI catches ball in arms and holds it
CHI opens her mouth wide and then grins broadly
CHI hugs the ball as she smiles with her mouth open
CHI throws the ball to MOT . <aft> CHI walks backwards rather unsteadily
CHI stumbles backwards then forwards towards MOT
tosses ball gently into CHI's arms
CHI walks backwards hugging the ball
CHI smiles with her mouth open
CHI walks backwards and throws ball to MOT
CHI smiles and sticks her tongue out
<bef> MOT catches the ball . MOT holds the ball and pretends to throw it up high by moving her arms up above her head
MOT brings the ball down . <aft> MOT throws the ball to CHI
CHI tries to catch the ball but misses
CHI still sticks out her tongue while smiling
CHI walks over to ball and picks it up off the floor and holds it tightly
CHI looks at MOT five seconds and moves her mouth
<aft> CHI throws the ball to MOT again
MOT leans over and moves a chair to get the ball from under it
MOT sits up and kicks ball across the floor away from both MOT and CHI
CHI runs over to ball and picks it up then throws it towards MOT . CHI continues running and runs over to the door
MOT picks up ball and throws it vertically into the air and catches it
CHI points at a ruler which is stuck on the door and looks at MOT
CHI puts face up close to ruler then turns to look at MOT
<bef> MOT rolls the ball to the other side of the room away from both MOT and CHI . <2- .7> MOT turns CHI around so that CHI's back is up against the ruler
<aft> MOT takes CHI by hand and pulls her away from the door
looks at floor then up at the wall ahead of her
<aft> MOT picks up the box from the ball activity and stands up and walks over to ball
MOT holds the box down low for CHI
CHI goes to the ball and picks it up
CHI puts the ball in box
MOT puts the box on the desk
CHI watches MOT . <aft> CHI looks in the trash can
CHI takes a few steps towards MOT
MOT takes the next box off of the desk and sits in the chair with it
CHI taps the can and then walks over to the corner
<bef> MOT removes the cover of the box . <aft> MOT holds up the towel still in the box
CHI turns and looks at the towel
<aft> MOT removes the towel and dangles it in fran of CHI
CHI walks over to the towel with her arms outstretched
MOT throws the towel gently over CHI's head and outstretched arms
CHI tries to remove the towel
CHI turns around and pulls towel off her head onto her shoulders
CHI looks up at MOT smiling
<bef> CHI walks towards the door and pulls the towel off further . CHI hands MOT the towel
MOT takes the towel from CHI and starts to hold it up
CHI turns towards MOT and looks at the towel then raises one arm towards the towel
<$=3> MOT holds the towel up in front of her head
MOT turns her head to the side briefly
CHI walks to the towel and lifts it up to see MOT's face
MOT drops the towel to her lap
CHI walks behind the chair near the door and touches the door
MOT holds the towel open and then throws it gently over CHI
CHI throws the towel off of her head
MOT takes the towel off of CHI
CHI runs around front of MOT to table
MOT starts to fold up the cloth
CHI reaches up and touches the empty box
MOT puts the towel back in the box
CHI glances at the wall quickly and then watches MOT
<$=1> MOT puts the box on her lap and puts the cover on it
CHI runs over to the door
MOT puts the other box on table
CHI pulls on the door knob
<bef> MOT puts the box on her lap . MOT removes the cover of the box
CHI walks closer to the box
<aft> CHI looks at the box smiling
MOT lifts up the paper and gestures towards the little chair at the table with it
CHI draws on paper inside box
MOT bends forward slightly as she watches CHI
CHI stops drawing and hold her crayon in the air
CHI picks up another crayon in the box and rubs it against the other one
CHI draws on one crayon with the other
<aft> MOT picks up a crayon and scribbles on paper
CHI looks down at her crayons
MOT puts down the crayon and stacks the pieces of paper together
CHI lets go of one crayon and then scribbles on the paper with the other one
CHI walks over to the table with the crayon in her hand . CHI then starts to climb up on chair but only gets halfway up
MOT gets up from the chair near the door and brings the crayons and paper box over to the table
<aft> MOT takes the paper and crayons out of box and puts them on table in front of CHI
CHI starts to scribble on the paper with the crayon she has in her hand but stops and gets down off chair
CHI tries to get up on the chair
MOT lifts CHI onto the chair
<bef> draws in breath rapidly to show dissatisfaction
CHI points to another chair nearby
MOT moves the first chair off to the side behind CHI
CHI smiles and moves her feet in anticipation
CHI glances at the other chair briefly and then looks at the chair in front of her
CHI tries to put her foot up on the chair
MOT holds the back of the chair steady
CHI points to the first chair
MOT pulls the chair over to the table
MOT lifts CHI onto the chair
CHI looks down at the chair
<$=1> MOT pushes the chair up to the table
CHI starts to draw and then stops
<bef> bumps into something on other side of table
CHI draws on the paper again then stops
CHI looks up in direction of MOT
there is an object like a tv screen or a computer monitor next to MOT
CHI looks at MOT then points in direction of TV
MOT is out of camera view
CHI looks at MOT and nods head
CHI starts to draw again then stops
CHI looks at the crayon she is holding
CHI pulls at end of crayon with other hand
CHI rubs the end of the crayon
CHI holds the crayon and looks up at MOT
MOT takes hold of the crayon
MOT inspects the end of the crayon
MOT rubs the crayon and then lets go of it
CHI looks at the end of the crayon again
MOT picks up a crayon and draws on the paper
CHI watches MOT draw and then reaches for MOT's crayon
CHI takes the crayon in her left hand and examines it
CHI drops that crayon and continues to draw with yellow crayon in right hand briefly
CHI picks up a crayon and starts to draw
CHI continues to draw pushing papers with her crayon . CHI then turns a page over and keeps drawing
the writing is on the other side of all of the papers
CHI continues to draw and then turns the page and draws on the other side
CHI quickly draws a line over the paper and stops abruptly
<bef> CHI draws on the paper . CHI stops drawing and moves the paper and then draws briefly
CHI points to drawing and looks up at MOT
CHI looks down at the paper
CHI looks down at the paper
<aft> CHI turns the paper over again and draws
<aft> CHI points to the picture and looks at MOT
CHI looks at MOT and points to the drawing
CHI points to the drawing and looks up at MOT smiling
< .1-2> CHI looks at the paper . <3> CHI looks up at MOT
<aft> MOT takes the crayon out of one hand and puts it in the other
MOT holds up the orange crayon . <aft> MOT draws with the orange crayon and then stops
<aft> MOT puts her . crayon down on the paper
CHI looks at the blue crayon
<bef> CHI draws briefly and then puts the crayon down . CHI puts her hands down on the paper
CHI pulls at some of the other paper on the table
CHI picks up blue crayon and puts it down then picks up yellow crayon and draws then puts it down
<aft> CHI turns away from the table
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
CHI starts to get off the chair
CHI continues to get off of the chair
MOT starts picking up the paper

CHI glances up towards the desk the down at the paper

MOT walks over to the desk
MOT is still out of camera view
CHI tries to get out of the chair
CHI looks up to see what MOT is doing
<bef> CHI lifts up the chair next to her
MOT removes the book from the box .
MOT sits down on the chair near the door
CHI tries to get up on MOT's lap
MOT lifts CHI up onto chair
CHI positions herself on MOT's lap and opens the book
<bef> MOT removes her glasses and puts them on the desk
MOT points to a picture in the book
CHI tries unsuccessfully to turn the page
<3-9> MOT helps CHI turn the page
<bef> MOT points to the picture of the owls
MOT points to the opposite page
CHI is trying to split the page she is turning into two pages
CHI throws her arms up in the air briefly
<bef> MOT points to the opposite page
MOT gestures to the book as she looks at it
MOT makes a slight gesture towards picture
CHI flaps her arms like chicken wings
<bef> CHI turns to the table and looks at MOT's pocketbook
CHI pick up the pocketbook and brings it over to her lap
MOT retrieves the paper from between pocketbook and table edge
CHI fiddles with the zipper of the pocketbook
<bef> MOT picks up the baby animals book . <2-4> exchanges it to other hand
CHI looks up at the book
MOT holds the book right in front of CHI's face and points at a picture on the cover
MOT tilts the cover of the book
CHI tries to open the pocketbook
MOT puts the book down on the table
CHI turns briefly to see what MOT is doing and then turns back to the pocketbook
MOT pulls out a different book
MOT holds the book in front of CHI and starts turning the pages
CHI looks up at the book
<bef> CHI looks down at the pocketbook . CHI gestures at the book
